name: Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo eShop & DSiWare
blurb: A comedy-puzzle game following the adventures of Orion the robot and friends for the Nintendo eShop and DSiWare!

rewards.reward: All pledges will be given a special thanks on our website, as well as our eternal gratitude. Much Love.

ORION'S SWORD REWARD-A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack plus some original digital art. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and a specially made Orion Key-chain in the mail.
EARLY ADOPTER REWARD: A digital copy of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo's eShop or DSiWare And some Digital Art.
GREEN TRIANGLE REWARD: A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack plus the digital copy of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo's eShop or DSiWare. You will also receive some original digital art!

ORION'S CROWN REWARD-A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack plus some original digital art. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and a specially made Orion Key-chain and a "Here to Help" Orion T-Shirt.

BLUE RHOMBUS REWARD: A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack plus the digital copy of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo's eShop or DSiWare. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and ONE Art print signed by one of our talented artists.

RED TRAPEZOID REWARD: A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack plus the digital copy of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo's eShop or DSiWare. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and FOUR Art prints signed by our talented artists. You will also receive a specially made Orion Key-chain in the mail.

ORION'S SHIELD REWARD- A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack plus some original digital art. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and a specially made Orion Key-chain and a "Here to Help" Orion T-Shirt. You will also receive one of 5 alternate smaller limited edition 3D printed Orion Statues made by us for YOU and a specially done rendering of you with Orion drawn by our very own Matt McKenna.

YELLOW HEXAGON REWARD: A digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack plus the digital copy of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo's eShop or DSiWare. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and FOUR Art prints signed by our talented artists. You will also receive a specially made Orion Key-chain and a "Here to Help" Orion T-Shirt. Lastly your name will be on a "Special Thanks" page in the game's credits.

ORANGE SQUARE REWARD: The digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack and the Digital Version of the Hands On! Tangrams soundtrack plus THREE digital copies of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo's eShop or DSiWare. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and FOUR Art prints signed by our talented artists. You will also receive a specially made Orion Key-chain and a "Here to Help" Orion T-Shirt. You will also receive one of 9 limited edition 3D printed Orion Statues made by us for YOU. Lastly you will be listed as an Associate Producer in a "Super Special Thanks" page in the game's credits and a specially done rendering of you with Orion drawn by our very own Matt McKenna.

BEIGE RHOMBUS REWARD: The digital version of the Orion's Odyssey soundtrack and the Digital Version of the Hands On! Tangrams soundtrack plus SIX digital copies of Orion's Odyssey for Nintendo's eShop or DSiWare. You will also receive by mail, the limited set of Orion's Odyssey Buttons (set of 4) and FOUR Art prints signed by our talented artists. You will also receive a specially made Orion Key-chain and a "Here to Help" Orion T-Shirt. You will also receive one of 9 limited edition 3D printed Orion Statues made by us for YOU. Lastly you will be listed as an Executive Producer in a "Super Duper Special Thanks" page in the game's credits and a specially done rendering of you with Orion drawn by our very own Matt McKenna.
